attributes.action: To bring an end to means testing of Pensioners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
State Pensions in the UK should be in line with those in Europe,who do not use means-testing for their pensioners,and we are,after all,ourselves in Europe.
We also request that the Prime Minister abolishes Council Tax,because all British pensioners have spent an entire working life paying income tax,and means-testing is intrusive and demeaning to the elderly.
